comment: If the images of both ` { A } ` and ` U ` are subsets of ` U ` and ` B ` follows ` A ` in the transitive closure of ` R ` , then ` B ` is an element of ` U ` . Similar to Proposition 77 of [Frege1879] p. 62. Compare with ~ frege77 . (Contributed by RP, 15-Jul-2020.)
